text: @piersmorgan There are several approved coronavirus vaccines in use to prevent animal diseases. There hasn’t been an economic driver for a human coronavirus vaccine. Viruses either cause mild symptoms (cold coronaviruses) or are very rare (MERS). Covid is different and a vaccine we will have.
